price: 79. Nabii Yuusuf: nanu Yalla eleelitnaah kaa maggansitna, Ni keela xaqul kak geyne numuk aka num beynaamak, toysa diggah nanu daalimiinih yan mara kinnino toh abne nee tekkek keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
